removes data frames from global environment

Difference in means

nice_estimate()

Formats estimates and 95% confidence intervals for nice printing.

nice_govuk_date()

Formats dates to gov.uk requirements

nice_inline_r()

Allows user to write examples of inline R code.

nice_load()

A function to load a single object from an R data file

nice_names()

Format column names into standard format.

nice_pc_change()

Easily calculate a percentage change

nice_perc()

Nicely formats percentages for printing

nice_pval()
